title: EVE Frontier MCP Resources
description: JSON Schema definitions for EVE Frontier MCP server resources

resources.name: Dataset Information
resources.description: Metadata about the currently loaded EVE Frontier dataset including system count, gate count, schema version, and load timestamp.

system_count.description: Total number of star systems in the dataset

gate_count.description: Total number of jump gate connections

database_path.description: Absolute path to the loaded database file

loaded_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the dataset was loaded

resources.name: Routing Algorithms
resources.description: List of available routing algorithms with descriptions. Use this to understand which algorithm is appropriate for different use cases.

name.description: Algorithm identifier to use in route_plan tool

use_cases.description: Recommended use cases for this algorithm

default.description: Default algorithm used when not specified

algorithms.name: bfs
algorithms.description: Breadth-first search for minimum hop count (ignores distances)
use_cases: Finding shortest path by number of jumps
Gate-only routing where all gates are equivalent

algorithms.name: dijkstra
algorithms.description: Shortest path by total distance in light-years

algorithms.name: a-star
algorithms.description: Heuristic-guided search using spatial coordinates (default, typically fastest)

resources.name: Spatial Index Status
resources.description: Information about the spatial index used for range queries. Required for systems_nearby tool.

available.description: Whether the spatial index is loaded and ready

source_checksum.description: SHA-256 checksum of the source database

build_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the index was built

freshness.description: Whether the index matches the current database
